assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Sarah Wordsworth and James Buchanan are co-applicants of a project funded through Genome British Columbia’s Genesolve programme and Illumina, and have received travel support from Illumina to attend conferences in Baltimore (USA), Barcelona (Spain), and Basel (Switzerland). Ilias Goranitis, Ingrid Slade, Angeliki Kerasidou, Mark Sheehan, and Katerina Sideri have no conflicts of interest to declare.
